title: Buff Azir

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Azir when played Middle. Statistics include Azir's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Azir Middle is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
please buff Azir. Riot, you have nerfed him a bit too much by removing his range to a point where he cant team fight without some serious peel, removed the knockup and nerfed his dmg. I beg you riot to buff at least one of those aspects of have mentioned to help Azir be a playable and "carry" champion that he used to be. Just check the stats from the link and azir when compared to other midlaners is terrible. BUFF HIM !!!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} please r i o t <3

replies.body:
Azir doesnt need a buff!

Im an Azir main and i have been playing him since the day he came out, he is fine where he is, he is a major late game player, and his laning phase is strong as hell. 

his win rate is only below 50% because he is a harder than usual champ and so when new people play him they don't do as well, but if you check Azir mains stats they are well over 50% win rate, theres just less of them than people who play him then lose and stop playing him, thats why his win rate and game state are so low.

TL;DR:
People who know how to play him have well over 50% win rates.
People who don't have under 50% cos he is a hard champ.
There is more of the latter than the former which puts his win-rate below 50% its not because he is a bad champ.

Dude, obviously someone who mains a champ, such as Azir in this case, can find ways around their champion when it comes to changes and nerfs. I myself, am a very passionate Zed player, and when he got nerfed during preseason, at first it felt quite different, but you get used to it really quickly.

Not trying to flame here, but for some people, nerfs mean a lot.
thanks for commenting, i do agree with his late game power but i feel his mid is too poor my opinion atm. (trying to become azir main)
